query: SELECT Country, Segment, SUM(CAST(GrossSales as DECIMAL(18,2))) as Revenue, SUM(CAST(Profit as DECIMAL(18,2))) as Profit, (SUM(CAST(Profit as DECIMAL(18,2))) / SUM(CAST(GrossSales as DECIMAL(18,2))) * 100) as ProfitMargin, COUNT(*) as Transactions FROM [Upload_edaa4303640341b48950bb3eb0385f60_20251215203858] GROUP BY Country, Segment HAVING SUM(CAST(GrossSales as DECIMAL(18,2))) > 1000000 ORDER BY ProfitMargin DESC
